Title: Aqueous Kinetic Solubility
Description: Kinetic aqueous solubility (μg/mL) was experimentally determined using the same SOP in over 200 NCATS drug discovery projects. A final dataset of 11780 non-redundant molecules and their associated solubility was used to train a SVM classifier. Approximately half of the dataset has poor solubility (< 10 μg/mL), and two-thirds of these low soluble molecules report values of < 1 μg/mL. A subset of the data used is available at PubChem (AID 1645848).
Interpretation: Probability of a compound having poor solublibity (< 10 µg/ml), and probability of a compound being highly soluble (<0.5: high solubility)
